meanings.definition: A female domestic servant in East Asia.
meanings.sent1: The amahs worked diligently to keep the house clean.
meanings.sent2: In the past, many families in East Asia employed amahs to help with household chores.
meanings.sent3: The amahs accidentally mixed up the laundry and turned all the white clothes pink!
meanings.sent4: The amahs were the silent guardians of the household, ensuring everything ran smoothly.
meanings.sent5: The young girl admired the amahs and dreamed of becoming one herself someday.

meanings.definition: Plural form of amah, referring to multiple female domestic servants in East Asia.
meanings.sent1: The wealthy family had several amahs to assist with various tasks.
meanings.sent2: The amahs gathered in the kitchen to prepare a delicious meal for the family.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous children played a prank on the amahs by hiding their cleaning supplies.
meanings.sent4: The garden bloomed with colors as vibrant as the uniforms of the amahs.
meanings.sent5: The laughter of the amahs echoed through the halls, bringing warmth to the household.
